plot: The X-Men work to settle the score before it is too late.

Magneto declares war on humanity, and the X-Men are split on whether to help or hinder him.Some join Magneto's side, while the others split their forces to fight Magneto, Bastion, and Mr. Sinister in their separate sanctuaries.Fighting the supposed villains, some of the X-Men pay the cost.—Gislef
